DOMO.MC.summary: Domo Activos, S.A., a real estate investment company, purchases, constructs, sells, and rents real estate properties in Spain. It establishes and manages investment vehicles; provides advisory services for purchase or sale of assets, as well as rent or sale of real estate properties; manages asset portfolios; supervises or manages buildings and their facilities; and administration, relationship with the tenants, collections, repairs, etc. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YADV.MC.summary: Advero Properties Socimi S.A. engages in the rental of housing in middle-income areas in Spain. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YVRS.MC.summary: Elix Vintage Residencial SOCIMI, S.A. invests in, rehabilitates, manages, rents, commercializes, and sells residential buildings in Barcelona and Madrid. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.
